alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 10:34AM CST until February 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow is winding down across the Kansas City area and points north. Only a dusting of additional snowfall is expected in this area. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Kansas and central, north central, northeast, northwest and west central Missouri. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snowfall Wednesday evening through Thursday morning is expected to stay south of the Kansas City Metro area. Blowing and drifting of snow is possible and could continue to cause slick road conditions for Wednesday evening`s commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
